Harmonizing data (achieving or improving inferential equivalence of data collected 
by separate studies) can be required in epidemiological research but is methodologically 
and technically challenging. Data collected by separate studies are typically 
heterogenous, and decisions on if and how to process data must be made, executed 
accurately, and documented in a transparent manner. Rmonize is an R package developed 
by Maelstrom Research 
<a href="https://www.maelstrom-research.org/" target="_blank">Maelstrom Research</a> 
to address some of the key challenges in this process and 
facilitate streamlined, reusable, and well documented harmonization pipelines.
